11.1. 
Table 11.1. Examples of issues for which guidance has been requested from the WHO Regional Office for 
Europe
ISSUE
Nutrition
- During the reproductive years
- During pregnancy and lactation
- For newborn, infants and young children
Physical activity 
- During pregnancy
Appropriate weight gain during pregnancy 
- In general and with specific focus on underweight and obesity in pregnant women
In addition, 45 Member States requested technical support in terms of guidance on the development
